docs.snippet: There will be a sterling array of up and coming golfers in the eighteenth annual women's New Jersey State championship to be held at the Crestmont Golf and Country Club in West Orange, beginning tomorrow and continuing through Friday, the thirteenth.

docs.snippet: ASUNCION, Paraguay, Sept. 7-- General Jose Felix Estigarribia, President of Paraguay for little more than a year, and his wife were killed today in an airplane crash.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 7.--The United States has informed the twenty Latin-American republics that they are free to use "on the fullest cooperative basis" the naval and air bases which the United States has obtained from Great Britain in exchange for...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 7.--The United States has informed the twenty Latin-American republics that they are free to use "on the fullest cooperative basis" the naval and air bases which the United States has obtained from Great Britain in exchange for over-age destroyers.

docs.snippet: With a fury not heretofore unleashed, German bombers attacked London last night. Censorship hid the exact extent of the damage, but official British admissions said it was great.
